name: The Treasures Of Montezuma
description:
Follow the beautiful and clever Dr. Emily Jones as she solves a mystery that can transform the world. The Treasures of Montezuma features unique gameplay in which you must make consecutive matches of the same artifacts to trigger Power Totems. Doing so unleashes awesome chain reaction effects that allow you to collect the gems you need before time runs out. Bonus games and stunning visuals wrap up the features of this dazzling adventure.
